name: KEYBOARD CAT: Doge Wars
description:
Game Overview 

Keyboard Cat is a top view, single-player arcade game with Gameboy controls. The player controls Keyboard Cat that has a special weapon called Crypto Sword. The player can kill enemies by swinging the crypto sword or he can throw his sword at enemies.

Fight for Doge Tokens!

Doge Token is the currency of Crypto Matrix. The Matrix is full of Doge Collectors; They hunt anybody even each other for the precious tokens. The more tokens you collect, your weapon gets bigger.

Who will be the dominator of the Doge War?

Also, Stay away from Melon Tusk!

Goal:

The goal is to increase your weapon size as much as possible by collecting Doge Tokens. Beware! don't get hit by enemies.

Contributors:

Ganzhong Guan:  Programming, Technical Design, Audio Design

Sai Prashanth Reddy Nareddy: Game Artist, UI Design, Animation Effects Design

Oguz Bicer: Game Design, Project Management, Level Designer

Constrains:
  • 1 Week Production
  • Gameboy Controls: D-pad, 2 buttons, Select, Start
  • 2 Bit color
  • 160x144 resolution for the downloadable version 
  • Default Size + 34Mb maximum
